function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential exposure to SARS-CoV-2 and other pathogens during wastewater sampling","Impact":"Risk of infection and transmission to sampling personnel","Mitigation":"Use of appropriate PPE, adherence to established safety procedures, and regular risk assessments","Technologies":"High-quality PPE, effective sampling and preservation techniques, robust RT-qPCR assay(s)","People":"Sampling personnel, community members","Owner":"Health and safety departments, research institutions"},{"Description":"Ethical concerns and need for approvals in developing monitoring programs involving community surveillance through WBE","Impact":"Ethical violations, lack of community consent, and legal complications","Mitigation":"Consultation with ethical guidelines, obtaining necessary approvals, and ensuring community consent","Technologies":"Ethical guidelines, approval processes, community engagement strategies","People":"Researchers, community members, ethical review boards","Owner":"Research institutions, ethical review boards"},{"Description":"Lack of quantitative predictions from viral RNA concentrations in sewage to actual numbers of cases in the community","Impact":"Inaccurate disease surveillance and response planning","Mitigation":"Further systematic research to establish quantitative predictions, developing effective enveloped virus concentration methods, and acquiring local prevalence and concentration data","Technologies":"Quantitative prediction models, effective concentration methods, data analysis tools","People":"Public health experts, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"}]}
